## Description {#details}

Instrumentation to print IR before/after passes.

Needs state to be able to print module after pass that invalidates IR unit (typically <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> or SCC).

Definition at line 47 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/passes/standardinstrumentations-h">StandardInstrumentations.h</a>.
